Module main.project
Package controller

Class AddProductForm

java.lang.Object
controller.AddProductForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Huy G To The AddProductForm class is where users add a new product to the inventory. it allows for a user to select parts and associate it with a product. It also generates a unique id and contains all the parameters for a product ojbect in its completion. saves on pressing the save button.
